paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The mutation BRCA2: c.289G > T (p.Glu97Ter) is a G-base substitution by T leading to a premature STOP codon at exon 3 of the BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to a premature STOP codon, likely resulting in a truncated protein.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on pathogenic classification
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been reported in the literature.
key_quotes: The mutation BRCA2: c.289G > T (p.Glu97Ter) is a G-base substitution by T leading to a premature STOP codon at exon 3 of the BRCA2 gene.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The mutation BRCA2: c.5116_5119delAATA (p.Asn1706Leufs) is a deletion of AATA that produces alteration in the reading frame and leads to a STOP codon in exon 11 of BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to a frameshift and likely results in a truncated protein.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on pathogenic classification
variants.additional_notes: This mutation has a founder effect in North Africa.
key_quotes: The mutation BRCA2: c.5116_5119delAATA (p.Asn1706Leufs) is a deletion of AATA that produces alteration in the reading frame and leads to a STOP codon in exon 11 of BRCA2.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition to these mutations, one BRCA2 VUS was found BRCA2: c.4090A > G (p.Ile1364Val) and co-occurred with a likely pathogenic mutation BRCA1: c.116G > A (p.Cys39Tyr).

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as a variant of unknown significance.

variants.evidence_level: Limited evidence due to VUS classification
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been reported in the Moroccan population.
key_quotes: In addition to these mutations, one BRCA2 VUS was found BRCA2: c.4090A > G (p.Ile1364Val) and co-occurred with a likely pathogenic mutation BRCA1: c.116G > A (p.Cys39Tyr).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted with detailed penetrance data.
